title: 216I.25 JUDICIAL REVIEW.
text: Any applicant, party, or person aggrieved by the issuance of a site or route permit, minor alteration, amendment, or emergency permit from the commission, by a certification of continuing suitability filed by a permittee with the commission, or by a final order in accordance with any rules promulgated by the commission may appeal to the court of appeals in accordance with chapter 14. The appeal must be filed within 30 days after the date the notice of the commission's permit issuance is published in the EQB Monitor, certification is filed with the commission, or any final order is filed by the commission.
